tool_description: Calculates key performance indicators and metrics for maintenance operations including efficiency, costs, and fleet availability.

calculation_period_start.description: Start date for metrics calculation period

calculation_period_end.description: End date for metrics calculation period

include_efficiency_metrics.description: Whether to include efficiency and productivity metrics

include_quality_metrics.description: Whether to include quality and compliance metrics

fleet_filter.description: Filter to specific vehicle IDs if not calculating for entire fleet

error_messages: Invalid date range: calculation_period_start must be before calculation_period_end.
Insufficient data: Not enough maintenance data available for the specified period.
Date range too large: Calculation period cannot exceed 2 years.
Calculation error: Unable to compute metrics due to data inconsistencies.
usage: Provide calculation period dates and optionally select which metric categories to include. Returns comprehensive performance metrics and KPIs.

calculation_period.description: Period covered by the metrics calculation

total_maintenance_events.description: Total number of maintenance events in period

fleet_availability_percentage.description: Average fleet availability during the period

schedule_adherence_percentage.description: Percentage of maintenance completed on schedule

cost_variance_percentage.description: Variance between estimated and actual costs
